message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $120. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $150 is my bottom line.  I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price for the value you're getting.
